name: Snowball (itch)
description:
Become the biggest snowball you can! become larger and larger as you roll down the mountain, but avoid trees and rocks, they'll break you down!

Watch out for the angry Yeti, he's trying to take you down in his snowplough and will succeed if you're not big enough. Consume the skiers and defeat the Yeti for extra points. Get awesome air by aiming for the cabins.

Controls

Hit A or left arrow to move left.

Hit D or right arrow to move right.

Push Esc to pause/resume the game.

Lead Programmer - John Adams
Lead Visual Designer - Ruan Snyman
Additional Visuals - Mike Doherty
